markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 5](/Rules.aspx?ID=110)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 30 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Adam writes “druid” on the class line of his character sheet and fills in the number 1 in the level box. The druid class grants an ability boost to its key ability score, which is Wisdom, so Adam’s character has his Wisdom raised to 16.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Step 5

<additional-info>

text: Step 5 Source Core Rulebook pg. 30 4.0 Adam writes “druid” on the class line of his character sheet and fills in the number 1 in the level box. The druid class grants an ability boost to its key ability score, which is Wisdom, so Adam’s character has his Wisdom raised to 16.
